properties.description: This is the S51 advice curated table for ODT consumption

source:
%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW odw_curated_db.vw_nsip_s51_advice
AS
SELECT 
    s51.adviceId
    ,s51.adviceReference
    ,CASE s51.caseID
        WHEN 'None' THEN 
            CAST("-1" as INT)
        ELSE 
            s51.caseId
    END AS caseId
    ,proj.caseReference
    ,s51.title
    ,s51.titleWelsh
    ,s51.from
    ,CASE LOWER(s51.agent)
        WHEN 'none' THEN 
            NULL
        ELSE 
            s51.agent
    END AS agent
    ,CASE LOWER(s51.method)
        WHEN 'none' THEN 
            NULL
        ELSE 
            LOWER(s51.method)
    END AS method
    ,s51.enquiryDate
    ,s51.enquiryDetails
    ,s51.enquiryDetailsWelsh
    ,s51.adviceGivenBy
    ,s51.adviceDate
    ,s51.adviceDetails
    ,s51.adviceDetailsWelsh
    ,CASE
        WHEN s51.status IN ('Not Checked','unchecked','Depublished') THEN 
            "unchecked"
        WHEN s51.status = 'Do Not Publish' THEN 
            'donotpublish'
        ELSE LOWER(s51.status)
    END AS status
    ,s51.redactionStatus
    ,s51.attachmentIds
FROM 
    odw_harmonised_db.nsip_s51_advice AS s51
    INNER JOIN odw_curated_db.nsip_project AS proj
        ON s51.caseId = proj.caseId
WHERE 
    s51.IsActive = 'Y'
UNION 
SELECT -- We have general S51 advice not linked to a case. Unioning to make sure we bring that in too
    s51.adviceId
    ,s51.adviceReference
    ,CASE s51.caseID
        WHEN 'None' THEN 
            CAST("-1" as INT)
        ELSE 
            s51.caseId
    END AS caseId
    ,s51.caseReference
    ,s51.title
    ,s51.titleWelsh
    ,s51.from
    ,CASE LOWER(s51.agent)
        WHEN 'none' THEN 
            NULL
        ELSE 
            s51.agent
    END AS agent
    ,CASE LOWER(s51.method)
        WHEN 'none' THEN 
            NULL
        ELSE 
            LOWER(s51.method)
    END AS method
    ,s51.enquiryDate
    ,s51.enquiryDetails
    ,s51.enquiryDetailsWelsh
    ,s51.adviceGivenBy
    ,s51.adviceDate
    ,s51.adviceDetails
    ,s51.adviceDetailsWelsh
    ,CASE
        WHEN s51.status IN ('Not Checked','unchecked','Depublished') THEN 
            "unchecked"
        WHEN s51.status = 'Do Not Publish' THEN 
            'donotpublish'
        ELSE LOWER(s51.status)
    END AS status
    ,s51.redactionStatus
    ,s51.attachmentIds
FROM 
    odw_harmonised_db.nsip_s51_advice AS s51
WHERE 
    s51.IsActive = 'Y'
    AND caseReference = 'General'

from pyspark.sql import SparkSession
spark = SparkSession.builder.getOrCreate()
view_df = spark.sql('SELECT * FROM odw_curated_db.vw_nsip_s51_advice')
view_df.write.mode("overwrite").saveAsTable('odw_curated_db.nsip_s51_advice')
